item.title: Uranus: Simple, efficient sgx programming and its applications
item.description: Jiang, Jianyu, Xusheng Chen, TszOn Li, Cheng Wang, Tianxiang Shen, Shixiong Zhao, Heming Cui, Cho-Li Wang, and Fengwei Zhang, in the Fifteenth ACM Asia Conference on Computer and Communications Security (AsiaCCS'20).

item.title: vSMT-IO: Improving I/O Performance and Efficiency on SMT Processors in Virtualized Clouds
item.description: Weiwei Jia, Jianchen Shan, Tsz On Li, Heming Cui, and Xiaoning Ding. Proceedings of the 2020 USENIX Annual Technical Conference.

item.title: UPA: An Automated, Accurate and Efficient Differentially Private Big-data Mining System
item.description: Tsz On Li, Jianyu Jiang, Ji Qi, Chi Chiu So, Jiacheng Ma, Xusheng Chen, Tianxiang Shen, Heming Cui, Yuexuan Wang, and Peng Wang. Proceedings of the 50th IEEE/IFIP International Conference on Dependable Systems and Networks.

item.title: Fulva: Efficient Live Migration for In-memory Key-Value Stores with Zero Downtime
item.description: Jiewen Hai, Cheng Wang, Xusheng Chen, Tsz On Li, Heming Cui, Sen Wang. Proceedings of the 38th IEEE International Symposium on Reliable Distributed Systems 2019

item.title: OWL: Understanding and Detecting Concurrency Attacks
item.description: Shixiong Zhao, Rui Gu, Haoran Qiu, Tsz On Li, Yuexuan Wang, Heming Cui, Junfeng Yang. Proceedings of the 48th IEEE/IFIP International Conference on Dependable Systems and Networks 2018.
